feedbackQuestions.ask: What would you like to know?
feedbackQuestions.comment: Let us know what's on your mind
feedbackQuestions.suggestion: Let us know what you'd like to improve

feedbackConsole.question: Any issues with your GitHub Integration?

feedbackModal.selectHelperMessage: Choose a type of your feedback

checkbox.research: I'd like to participate in product research.
checkbox.policy: Yes, Atlassian teams can contact me to learn about my experiences to improve Atlassian products and services.

noTokenEmptyState.description: You haven't set a GitHub Personal Access Token (PAT) yet. This token is required for the app to access your repositories.

popUpMessage.success: Your token has been successfully saved.
popUpMessage.warning: Your token has been successfully removed.
popUpMessage.error: Your token is invalid or expired. Please generate a new one and try again.

instruction.text: Enter your GitHub Personal Access Token (PAT) to continue. Learn how to create one:

tokenInput.label: Personal Access Token
tokenInput.errorMessage: Invalid token format. Please check and try again.
tokenInput.helperMessage: Use a fine-grained or classic PAT generated in your GitHub account settings.
